document.full_text: exchange giant nyse euronext  is looking to set up two parallel clearing services if it seals its proposed deal to buy anglo-french clearing house lch.clearnet as well as merging with deutsche boerse .
document.title: nyse euronext plans dual clearing venues with lch
lines_and_colors: exchange giant nyse euronext  is looking to set up two parallel clearing services if it seals its proposed deal to buy anglo-french clearing house lch.clearnet as well as merging with deutsche boerse .
